events.title: DSC F24 Intro Social
events.description: Join us for our Fall 2024 intro social! Meet the board, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow data science enthusiasts.

events.title: Intro to PyTorch
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of PyTorch, including tensors, neural networks, and how to build basic deep learning models.

events.title: Career Workshop
events.description: Get tips on resume building, interview preparation, and navigating the data science job market.

events.title: Ian Watson, Google: A Journey Through Data Science
events.description: Join us for an insightful talk with Ian Watson as he shares his experiences and career path in data science.

events.title: DSC Alumni Career Panel
events.description: Hear from successful DSC alumni about their career journeys, challenges, and advice for aspiring data scientists.

events.title: Nick Singh, DataLemur: Acing the Data Science Interview
events.description: Learn interview strategies and tips from Nick Singh, author of 'Ace the Data Science Interview'.

events.title: Bloomberg Data Info Session
events.description: Learn about data science opportunities at Bloomberg and network with their recruiting team.

events.title: Nang Ang, PearAI: Breaking into Y Combinator
events.description: Discover insights about startup culture and entrepreneurship from Nathan Ang, a CMU and Y Combinator alumnus.

events.title: Big Data Workshop
events.description: Explore big data technologies and learn how to process and analyze large-scale datasets effectively.

events.title: How to Pitch Your Data
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of data visualization to effectively transform raw data into clear, impactful visuals for better insights and communication.

events.title: Joy Zhang, Airbnb: Artificial Intelligence: The Past, Present and Future
events.description: Join Dr. Joy Zhang, Director of Engineering at Airbnb, as he shares insights from his journey through academia, startups, and big tech, discussing the evolution and future of AI technology.

events.title: NLP Workshop
events.description: Join our introductory NLP workshop to explore some fundamental text processing techniques, such as n-gram models, Bag of Words, and TF-IDF. Learn how these techniques work, their role in text analysis, and how they can be used for feature extraction and representation in machine learning.
